column2: "Meyɛɛ krado tweɔɔn hɔn a woemmbisa m'ekyir kwan; hɔn a wɔannhwehwɛ me no meyɛɛ krado dɛ nkyɛ wobohu me: mesee hɔn a wɔammfa me dzin ammfrɛ hɔn no dɛ
column3: Emi nye yi

column2: "Matserɛw m'abaw mu adzekyee nyina ama ɔman etuatsewfo hɔn a wɔnantsew ɔkwan bɔn do dzi hɔnankasa hɔn adwen ekyir;"
"ɔman a woyi me ehi wɔ m'enyim daa nyina
column3: wɔbobɔ okum afɔr wɔ nture mu
column4: na wɔhyew nduhuam wɔ ntaayaa do;"

column3: wɔdeda asamandan mu; wodzi mprekonam
column4: na ekyiwadze nkwan wɔ hɔn asɛn mu;"

column3: Tsew woho gyina
column5: na mo ho tsew sen wo: iyinom yɛ wusiw wɔ m'ahwen mu

column3: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ m'enyim: murummua m'ano
column6: mebɛhyɛ ananmu egu hɔn bo mu
column8: "homara hom emumuyɛ na hom egyanom hɔn emumuyɛ ka ho
column9: dɛ wɔahyew nduhuam wɔ mbepɔw do
column10: na wɔaka mo ho asɛm bɔn wɔ akoko do
column11: EWURADZE na ɔse: dɛm ntsi mibedzi kan mesusu hɔn kan edwuma ho akatua egu hɔn akoko mu."

column3: Dɛ mbrɛ wohu nsa fofor wɔ wenyinaba siaw mu
column6: na nhyira wɔ mu no: dɛmara so na mebɛyɛ wɔ mo nkowaa ntsi

column2: "Na medze asefo befi Jakob mu aba
column3: na me mbepɔw adzedzinyi efi Juda aba: na me mpamufo benya edzi

column2: "Na Saron bɛyɛ nguamban na Akor bɔnsa ayɛ anantwikuw dabea
column3: ama me man a wɔhwehwɛɛ m'ekyir kwan no."

column2: "Na hom a hom dan EWURADZE gya
column3: hom werɛ fir me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn
column5: na hom hyɛ aforafora nsa ma Nkrabea;"

column3: na hom nyinara bɔkotow ama oku: osiandɛ mefrɛe no
column5: hom anntse; na mbom hom yɛɛ dza omuo wɔ m'enyi do
column6: na hom saan mu yii dza minnyi enyigye wɔ mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column6: ɔkɔm bɛdze hom: mo nkowaa bɔnom
column10: naaso hom dze hom enyi bɔtɔ:"

column3: mo nkowaa bɔtow ndwom wɔ akoma mu enyigye ntsi
column5: hom bɛkeka mu wɔ akoma mu awerɛhow ntsi
column6: na hom aka mmɔn wɔ sunsum n'ahomtsew ntsi."

column2: "Na hom begyaa hom dzin ma aayɛ ndom ama me mpamufo
column3: na EWURADZE Nyankopɔn boku wo; na ɔbɔto no nkowaa dzin fofor:"

column2: "ama nyia ohyira noho wɔ asaase do no
column3: oeehyira noho wɔ nokwar Nyankopɔn mu; na nyia ɔka ntam wɔ asaase do no
column4: ɔdze nokwar Nyankopɔn aka ntam; osiandɛ werɛ efir nkan no fona no
column5: na osiandɛ oehuntsa efi m'enyi do."

column3: hwɛ
column4: morobɔ ɔsorsor fofor na asaase fofor: na nkan no ndzɛmba no wɔrennkaa
column5: eso wɔremmfa mmba adwen mu bio."

column2: "Na mbom hom nnya ahomka na hom ndzi ehurusi daa daa wɔ dza morobɔ no ntsi: na
column3: hwɛ
column5: na no mu mba ma aayɛ enyigye."

column3: na m'enyi agye wɔ me man ho: na wɔnnkɛtse osu ne nka wɔ no mu bio
abɔtoaba a ne nda suar
column4: anaa akɔdaa a onnwiee ne nda dzi remmba hɔ bio: na abofra edzi mfe ɔha ana oewu
column5: na ɔdzebɔnyɛnyi a odzi mfe ɔha no bɛyɛ obusunyi."

column3: na wɔatsenatsena mu; na wɔatsɛw wenyin nture
na obi atsena mu; wɔnnkɛtsɛw
column4: na obi edzi: na mbrɛ dua ne nda tse no
column5: mbrɛ me man hɔn nda bɛyɛ ara nye no
column6: na me mpamufo bedzi hɔn nsaano edwuma akyɛr."

column3: eso wɔronnwo mba mma mbusu; na wɔyɛ EWURADZE n'esiarfo hɔn asefo
column4: na hɔn mba ka hɔn ho."

column3: ansaana wɔrefrɛ no
column4: nna magye do; na wɔda do rekasa no

column3: na ogyata awe efuw dɛ ɔnantwi: na huntuma na ɔbɛyɛ abowatsena n'edziban. Wɔnnkɛyɛ obi bɔn
column4: eso wɔrennsɛɛ wɔ me bepɔw krɔnkrɔn nyina do
